attributes.review: WORST freaking APP AND MAN EVER, I was eating a piece of belonga and the app said “your fat” I got so offended and it made me cry! Don’t know who in the right mind would download this app to support an , 🍊, racist, sexist, man, who keeps his son away from everyone.
attributes.title: I almost Died for this app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see why I should vote for Mr. Trump this election and all I found was fake news. Not to mention the app was super laggy and took ages to download! I would not recommend downloading this horrible app.
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: The only reason I came in here is because I’m pretty sure half the country doesn’t want Donald Trump as president anymore and th ere are various reasons why. Please delete this app.
attributes.title: Donald Trump really doesn’t need to be president anymore

attributes.review: I got this on my old phone to find reasons i should vote for trump again but then all of a sudden my phone started flashing and over heating and then just blew up on top of that it killed my mom DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: Dont download this

attributes.review: It made my phone glitch and started showing lewd pictures everywhere on my screen until I deleted the app don’t download
attributes.title: This app is awful
